GamEffective is an enterprise gamification platform for sales, customer service, social collaboration and employee elearning. 

The platform goes beyond badges and leaderboards and uses rich game narratives to give employees clear calls to action that encourage on the job mastery and leave lasting organizational change, reflecting corporate objectives and performance goals. 

GamEffective’s platform uses rich graphical narratives that range from fantasy sports to racing; and is easy to implement due to its no-code integration. Employee engagement is measurable, providing analytical insight.

Driving engagement
•	Keeps employees focused on the activities that matter
•	Use narratives such as races, sports and more, to provide context and drive
•	Set and track goals on a daily or weekly basis
•	Combine learning into any scenario
•	Provide recognition and communicate
•	Integrates with additional apps and data sources

GamEffective's platform is deployed in long running projects with Fortune 500 companies.
